title: Goldfish Movie Maker (2019)
note:
Make Your Movie!
Finn & Friends are ready to make their big debut on the big screen and you get to be the director! Choose your cast and costumes, select different settings and background music, and record all the action and dialogue. Where the story goes is all up to you!
Ready to create your epic blockbuster? Lights, camera…action! Large file, uses the internet archive. ~96 MB.
